rules_text:
You gain 1 life for each card in your graveyard.
Vestige– {2}{W}{W}, Exile the top six cards of your library. [i](You may pay {2}{W}{W} and exile the top five cards of your library and discard a card to cast this card from your graveyard.)[/i]
notes:
2k17
Vestige 2WW > Vestige 2WW, Exile the top six cards of your library
Added flavor text

fluffy: +You, added period (Conflagrate)
